name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tuna - Magic Tab and Bookmark Manager

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Magic Tool for Tab and Bookmark Management

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tuna-Magic Tab and Bookmark Manager
- Vertical layout based on the browser sidebar, accurately identifying each page.
- Organize complicated pages in diverse ways such as Spaces - Pinned Bookmarks - Frequently Used Bookmarks - Temporary Bookmarks.
- Quickly sort out by dragging and dropping.
- Based on bookmark and tab APIs, completely local. Even if you close the browser, you can still return to the previous state when you open it next time.
